Title: Ripple Effect In Silverlight 2
Description: This is a library to generate a circular ripple effect in a Silverlight 2 application.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a library to generate a circular ripple effect in a Silverlight 2 application.


To use the library:

Create an instance of RippleEffect.RippleEffect

RippleEffect( Panel )


Call function CircularRipple
CircularRipple (Radius, Ripple Thickness, Center, Animation Duration, Ripple Count, Image Source)

thats it enjoy :).
